actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to make emergency market loss payments to dairy producers for any month in which the national average price for Class III milk under Federal milk marketing orders is less than a target price of $11.50 per hundredweight.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make emergency market loss payments to dairy producers (in the 48 contiguous States) whenever the national average Class III milk price for a month is less than a specified target price.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to make emergency market loss payments to dairy producers for any month in which the national average price for Class III milk under Federal milk marketing orders is less than a target price of $11.50 per hundredweight.
